briefdescription.para: Concatenates the append string to the base string.

parameterdescription.para: String to append to the base.

simplesect.para: const char* append string concatenated to the base string.

briefdescription.para: Gets a 16-bit hash-code utilizing epoch timestamp as the seed.
Converts degrees to radians.
Converts radians to degrees.
Encodes a double to an int16_t data-type.
Decodes a uint16_t to a double data-type.

Converts a data-table column process-type enumerator to a short abbreviated textual string. The shortened and abbreviated textual string of the process-type uses a julian convention e.g. DATATABLE_COLUMN_PROCESS_SMP represents a data-table column process-type as a sample and will output Smp for the short abbreviated textual string.

detaileddescription.para: For full textual representation of the data-table column process-type, see datatable_process_type_to_string function.

parameterdescription.para: Data-table column process-type enumerator to convert to a short abbreviated textual string.

simplesect.para: char* Data-table column process-type as a short abbreviated textual string.

briefdescription.para: Converts a data-table column process-type enumerator to a textual string. The textual string of the process-type uses a julian convention e.g. DATATABLE_COLUMN_PROCESS_MIN_TS represents a data-table column process-type as a sample and will output Minimum-TimeStamp for the textual string.

detaileddescription.para: For a short abbreviated textual representation of the data-table column process-type, see datatable_process_type_to_short_string function.

parameterdescription.para: Data-table column process-type enumerator to convert to a textual string.

simplesect.para: char* Data-table column process-type as a textual string.

briefdescription.para: Serializes data-logger time interval type enumerator to a textual string for json formating.

parameterdescription.para: Data-logger time interval type enumerator to serialize.

simplesect.para: char* Serialized data-logger time interval type as a textual string.

briefdescription.para: Serializes data-table column process-type enumerator to a textual string for json formating.

simplesect.para: char* Serialized data-table column process-type as a textual string.

briefdescription.para: Concatenates the process_type string to the column base_name string.

simplesect.para: const char* Column name with concatenated process_type string.

memberdef.argsstring: (datatable_handle_t datatable_handle, const datatable_event_types_t event_type, const char *message)
memberdef.name: datatable_invoke_event

briefdescription.para: Invokes data-table event when the data-table event handler is configured.

Gets the data-table column sample size maximum. The data-table column sample size maximum is a whole number that represents the total number of samples that can be pushed onto the stack for analytical processing which is defined by the process-type setting for each column configured in the data-table.

detaileddescription.para: As an example, if the data-table sampling task schedule event occurs every 10-seconds and the data-table processing event occurs every minute, data-table column data buffer created for analytical processing will be sized to store a maximum of 6 samples. If the data-table column data buffer created for analytical processing is processed with less than 6 samples, the data-table record is skipped, and logged as a skipped record processing event for the data-table.

parameterdescription.para: Data-table column sample size of maximum samples that can be stored.

briefdescription.para: Checks if the data-table column exist by column index.

parameterdescription.para: Data-table column index to check if it exist.

simplesect.para: esp_err_t ESP_OK on success, ESP_ERR_INVALID_ARG when the index is out of range and column does not exist.

briefdescription.para: Checks if the data-table is full (i.e. number of rows matches configured rows size).

parameterdescription.para: True when data-table is full, otherwise, false.

memberdef.argsstring: (datatable_buffer_t *buffer, const uint16_t samples_size, const datatable_column_data_types_t data_type)
memberdef.name: datatable_free_buffer

briefdescription.para: Frees a data-table buffer entity and subentities.
Frees a data-table row entity and subentities.
Pops the top data-table row and shifts the index of remaining rows up by one i.e. first-in-first-out (FIFO) principal.
Resets data-table rows, this is full reset, all data is deleted and data-table row array is re-initialized per configured row size.
Resets data-table column data buffer by column index.

parameterdescription.para: Index of data-table column to reset column data buffer.

briefdescription.para: Resets data-table column data buffer for configured columns.
Pops the top data-table data buffer by column index and shifts the index of remaining samples up by one i.e. first-in-first-out (FIFO) principal.

parameterdescription.para: Data-table column index to FIFO data buffer to pop.

briefdescription.para: Pops the first data-table data buffers for configured columns and shifts the index remaining samples by one i.e. first-in-first-out (FIFO) principal.

memberdef.argsstring: (datatable_handle_t datatable_handle, const uint8_t index, float *value_uc, float *value_vc, time_t *value_ts)
